abstract: We present an assembly-design environment that supports the JavaBeans extensible runtime containment and services protocol. The environment provides: a vehicle for demonstrating the Java component model; a third-party client for testing BeanContext and BeanContextChild components; and a prototype illustrating how a visual builder might unify visual and context nesting during component assembly.

authors.name: David H. Lorenz
authors.affiliation: College of Computer Science, Northeastern University, Boston, MA

authors.name: Predrag Petkovic
authors.affiliation: College of Computer Science, Northeastern University, Boston, MA

title: ContextBox (extended abstract) (poster session): a visual builder for context beans
